summary: App for managing Blue Panthers sign-ups, with an admin page requiring authentication to view who has signed up.
architectural_notes: Admin sign-up viewer page is protected behind authentication (sign-in required)

existing_features.title: Create a dedicated protected page (e.g., '/signups') that displays the list of all players who have signed up for Blue Panthers. The page must require the user to be signed in via Internet Identity before the sign-up list is shown. If the user is not authenticated, display a prompt to sign in rather than the list.

new_feature_requests.summary: Protected admin page requiring sign-in to view Blue Panthers sign-up list

Expose or reuse the existing backend query that returns all sign-ups so the new protected page can fetch the full list of sign-ups for authenticated callers. Ensure the query is accessible to any authenticated user (not only admins) if that is the intended access level, or confirm it remains admin-gated.
